definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
treasure of spirits/Silmarillion or Quenta Silmarillion by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金

sentences.english: Three classes for the Eleven-kings under the sky.
sentences.chinese: 三个班属于天空下的精灵王。

sentences.english: He explained that he was robbing the bank because Santa had to pay his elves.
sentences.chinese: 他竟然说抢银行是为了要给小精灵们付工钱。

sentences.english: These kinds of jinn can be killed with date or plum stones fired from a sling.
sentences.chinese: 可以用弹弓发射枣核或者李子核射杀这几种精灵。

sentences.english: I met a prince, Fairy Godmother.
sentences.chinese: 我遇到了一个王子，精灵教母。

sentences.english: It was in the States that he gained both his elvish workforce and a wife.
sentences.chinese: 他就是在美国得到了他的精灵工人以及妻子。

sentences.english: Does the Saier number invite how many spirit of letter energy?
sentences.chinese: 赛尔号邀请函能的多少个精灵？

sentences.english: You've only seen some of the great Blood Elf architecture with Silvermoon City.
sentences.chinese: 你已经在银月城看见一些血精灵的宏伟建筑了。

sentences.english: Do you still remember the casper in the movie of Hollywood?
sentences.chinese: 还记得好莱坞电影里的小精灵吗？

sentences.english: My people turned to me for answers.
sentences.chinese: 接上去，我把我的百姓称为“辛多雷”，血精灵。

sentences.english: Together the night elves and their allies managed to close the portal.
sentences.chinese: 暗夜精灵和他们的盟友一起设法关闭了传送门。

sentences.english: That dream wizard waved his hands, I saw the scenery of the Antarctic and Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 那个梦精灵双手一挥，我看到了南极和北极的风光。

sentences.english: With a wicked pack of cards.
sentences.chinese: 她有一副鬼精灵的纸牌。

sentences.english: Improved Faerie Fire moved to Feral Tree. Requires Faerie Fire (Feral).
sentences.chinese: 增强精灵火移到了野性树。

sentences.english: She said spitefully that Jem was the most clumsy genie in the whole school.
sentences.chinese: 她说，Jem在整个学校最笨拙的精灵说。

sentences.english: This is an aqua blue again with a dynamic elf.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个水蓝色小精灵再次充斥活气。

sentences.english: Elfs in the world was watching us from the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 世界上的精灵在黑暗里看着我们。
